website_summaries.verdict: Sharp octopus logo makes It the best-looking snorkel bag out there.
pros: Good quality construction with heavy-duty mesh and stitched seams
The bag rolls into itself and forms a pouch with a handle for easy storage
Has both hand straps and a shoulder strap for heavier gear
Comes in large or extra large sizes
cons: Some issues with the zipper on the side pocket failing

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but probably not strong enough for a full set of scuba weights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when I was going for my SCUBA certification. The shop I was getting my certification at had some rather expensive bags and I didn't want to spend that much so I got this one instead. It's quite roomy (longer than I needed, for sure--I'm 6'3" and they fit my flippers just fine), and the mesh makes for easy drying. That said, when I keep a full set of weights in the bag, I'm concerned it might break. So I'll probably only put in the weights I plan to use or keep the weights outside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dive gear.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. We bought two to use for carrying our scuba kits on and off dive boats. I’m a big guy and this fits my bcd, regs, fins, two masks, heavy wetsuit, hood, booties, gloves, dry bag, camera, and other miscellaneous dive gear with ease- basically everything but air tanks. We had a slight issue with one bag but the seller was immediately responsive and made things right beyond what I would have asked so I’m as impressed with the seller as I am with the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Keeps gear organized and ventilated for quick drying.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to store my Swift Water Rescue gear. I liked that it would be easy to pick out when our teams gear is all stored together. The gear includes a drysuit, PFD, boots, gloves and helmet and extra clothing. I haven’t taken it to work yet but have no doubts it has plenty of space for everything. The bag seems well made and while I was skeptical of the zipper at first it actually seems pretty sturdy and is similar to the zippers we use on our everyday gear bags. Currently I have my family’s pfd’s in it. They dried out quickly after using them. I’ll update the review after using it at work.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Big, light weight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect bag for our snorkel gear. We were able to fit five sets of fins, masks, snorkels, and five big beach towels. There was even room for water bottles and snacks. It gets real heavy with all that gear, but the bag handles it well. The only thing that could have made it better was shoulder straps. We used it for three stops on a cruise and toted the thing everywhere. When not in use, it folds back into itself and takes up practically no room at all.
customer_reviews.author: Denial15

customer_reviews.title: Great bag backed by excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XL to carry my kayaking gear. I like the bag but the zipper came off track first time I used it. The slider is made of plastic and is very flimsy. I bought this bag last August so the zipper is the old style. To be fair, the website says they are now using a larger zipper. I was contacted by the owner of Kraken Aquatics regarding my problem with the zipper. He sent me a new bag with the larger zipper free of charge I have no doubt I'll be upgrading my review to 5 stars after I've had the opportunity to use the bag a few times. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: John K. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Duffle Bag can be used on land too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our basketball club that plays weekly. I needed a bag with lots of ventilation so that when the sweaty jerseys get stuffed in it after we play they wouldn't turn into mold. (haha) I also needed room to stuff our basketball in it and this bag has plenty of room. Great handles, great carry strap, and a heavy duty zipper. So far it's been the perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ZOIKS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag - and it looks good too. I fully admit the reason I ordered it was because of the Octopus logo (fav animal), but I am very pleased with the bag as well. I had a slight tear in the strap of first bag I was sent, but I emailed them about it and they responded immediately and he even dropped off a replacement bag on my doorstep (I just happen to live in SLC where this company is located). I took this on the plane with me to Hawaii with 2 pairs of fins and masks, and it worked great. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great gear bag and very durable , Handy compartments
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and features . It’s my second kraken bag . My first got too small for my snorkel and my girls gear . It is still like new after more than a year . It was the sm. Drawstring type . So I purchased the large one . Wow lots of room , We can put our towels , gear and other miscellaneous Items in there with space left over . The large size is more than adequate for my needs . The extra large must be huge .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing a towable and ropes
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to carry a towable tube and some ropes and this bag is doing a great job at that!! I can get a two man tube, two sets of ropes and a spreader rope with protectors all in the bag. The thing that I like the best is the stuff can dry out without having to lay the tube out all the time. Easy to carry with nice handles and a carry strap.
customer_reviews.author: MNPilot

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but durability?
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the duffle but the materials seems very light weight to hold scuba gear, but it's big enough that I could fit my scuba equipment in it and if just snorkeling you can just fit three sets of mask fins and snorkel gear inside. Time will tell on how durable it is. But as of right now it's big enough and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew D.

customer_reviews.title: You can't be rough with the zippers
customer_reviews.text: This bag survived me lugging it long distances from the ship to the dive boat. I started out with the strap, then decided to use the other two straps as in a backpack style. MUCH easier. My husband was rougher on his bag. He ripped the zipper off of the top. Then ripped the zipper on the side. If you handle with care, and load the bag with even weight distribution, it is a great bag. You can't manhandle it, though, or you will tear it up quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke on first Trip
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke before even getting on the boat for my first dive with the bag after filling the it with a bcd, wetsuit, mask, snorkel, fins, and various other items for diving. Had to carry heavy bag by two handles. Not ideal for making trips to the dive boat with tanks and extra cloths bags. Can’t return so stuck with it for now
customer_reviews.author: Edwin A. Geoghegan, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking bag!
customer_reviews.text: I received the dive gear bag and all looks good. Zippers zip smoothly, don’t see any tears in mesh. Love the octopus logo design and think my husband will, too. It’s his Christmas gift. My husband has an older mesh bag I’m replacing with this one. Won't really know how the mesh compares till we get to Maui in a few months, but other reviews describe it as sturdy and that bag holds a lot. I'm confident it will work out. James, the owner is great at checking in with you and very conscientious about his product and happy customers!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using my new bag on a scuba trip in Bonaire. It is working great! Roomy and sturdy. I love the outside side pocket for its ease of use. The logo on the side is stylish but more importantly, helps my bag stand out in a sea of black gear bags.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is to weak to hold the weight
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great only if you have a few items such as you snorkel gear. It will not hold both your snorkel and dive gear. It will fit both but the zipper is to weak to hold the weight and will break. This is the second bag as this first bag the zipper broke and the seller was nice to send another and the second bag it broke again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Great mesh bag; however, it is NOT BIG ENOUGH for all scuba gear
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality mesh bag for the price. However, the large size will not fit all your scuba gear. I could only fit my BCD, full 3mm wetsuit, mask and snorkel. It did not fit my regulator bag or fins. This bag would be great for other purposes. If you are wanting a mesh bag for scuba gear, keep on looking. I am returning the one I just purchased because my intent was using it for my scuba gear.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: Due to cancer I'd been out of the water for a year. My dive bag zipper was frozen so I needed a new one quickly and chose the extra large Kraken mesh bag. I carry a fair bit of gear ("cold" water diving) so I need a large bag. This one is huge and easily carries all the gear I need to take with me.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill Bushing

customer_reviews.title: Great for freediving gear
customer_reviews.text: Great for freediving gear. Alternatively, it holds my girlfriend's scuba equipment comfortably. How well this bag is going to work for you just depends on what you're going to put in it. I use a Zeagle ranger BCD and 5mm wetsuit and while I managed to cram all of my scuba gear into this bag once I didn't feel like the bag was really sturdy enough to be carrying such a heavy load. I have a sturdier PVC coated mesh backpack that I rely on for transporting my gear to the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a bag to use for windsurfing. This bag fits his harness and all his smaller equipment. Even with that heavy stuff inside, it has been sturdy and stayed intact. He loves it and it works perfectly. He can even rinse his equipment at the hose if he needs to save time.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: The bag is large enough to hold two pairs of ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large enough to hold two pairs of fins and two pairs of masks, snorkels, other minor gear. I don't own an BCD or regulator so I can't speak to if the bag would be large enough to hold all the items.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good size
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use this bag for traveling with scuba gear, no tanks obviously, which I have not done so yet. But based on what I see in the design and quality, I think it will work out okay. I cannot confirm the durability at this time, so we shall have to wait and see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great dive bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dive bag for carrying all your gear! Sturdy construction, heavy duty zipper, and large enough for my needs (I ordered the Large). I have a full wetsuit, fins, mask/snorkel, booties, BCD (travel), dive computer, bathing suit & change of clothes with room to spare. I'm all set for my boat dive this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gentle

customer_reviews.title: Happy to add it to my kit
customer_reviews.text: The IKEA bag I was using to carry gear from my car to the shore/diveboat finally ripped. Took a recent trip to Indonesia where I brought along 26" fins, 3.5mm full suit, wing BC, regulator, mask, and torch. It was a bit bigger than needed but I'll have to ask myself that again when going out on my cold water dives with thicker wetsuits. The bag held up for the couple of days of use and collapsed up nice to stuff into my check in bag. Like others, the Octopus logo was a big draw for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag. It was the perfect size for all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It was the perfect size for all my gear, including 19" fins. It made staying organized and not leaving stuff all over the boat/dock easy on my recent dive trip. Folding it back up in the pouch is super easy. It didn't get quite as small as I hoped once folded up, but still a great bag. The shoulder strap is really handy also, and something many of the similar bags don't have. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ilisapeci

customer_reviews.title: Zipper came apart
customer_reviews.text: While the bag is big and drains well, the zipper on the side pocket fell apart on my first trip with it. I only used it to carry the gear from the car to the boat, so no extreme use. Lost my flashlight. Really a shame. I liked the bag because it was lightweight and held a full set of scuba gear. Another buck for better zippers would make this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: It definitely fits all the gear it should!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great bag. I've only had it for about a week, but it seems to be of high quality and definitely fits all my free diving gear (Fins, boots, mask, snorkle, knife, and misc. cleaning and maintenance gear). I also love that you can zip it closed in its broken down configuration, giving it a very small footprint while you are out doing your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good. The bag has sturdy zippers which is important. I use this to store my inflatable large tube with a canvas cover. Works out well. I hose the tube down and add it to the bag without worrying that it's still wet.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but did not last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bag for about 25 dives now. It looked like a nice and sturdy bag at first, but I can see it slowly ripping apart where the shoulder straps attach to the bag. It’s only a matter of time before all my contents spill out. I use it to carry my snorkel, fins, BCD, regs and occasionally my 5 mil wetsuit. Kinda disappointed as I really did like the bag.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got the XL and it's huge!! It holds a full set of scuba gear, plus extra pair of boots, wetsuit and towel. I love the huge inside pocket too! Great place to keep all misc stuff like sunscreen and camera then there's a smaller outside pocket for keys and phones. Definitely a good buy! As far as quality I'm using it this weekend for the first time so if it's anything below perfect I'll update 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Large and Stylish!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for what we needed!! We were going to Panama City Beach and needed a bag to carry 6 sets of masks and snorkels along with mesh shell bags. It fit all of that and we were able to fit towels in too for the days we went out snorkeling. It was stylish and well made. I am very happy with this purchase. I am sure I will be using this bag for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation to Belize. Held 4 peoples snorkel gear with easy. Coming back, we packed it with all kinds of additional clothes and other items. I was a little concerned with it going through the typical abuses from the airline but it came through with flying colors. One thing to note is that it the exterior is mesh and you can easily see what is in it. It was not obvious on the product images.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and its frickin cute.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is big enough to fit all of my fins, mask, snorkel, booties, and wetsuit. There is still some extra room, I think I could fit my BCD in there too without much trouble. I love the octopus on the bag, it was honestly the reason I bought this bag. I've had no issues with my zippers. I like that the bag can be rolled and zipped up inside itself for storage. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JessGerst

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not small! 2 snorkel sets and 2 pairs of long fins fit in there and still theres lots of room left. There's is a side pocket on inside part of one of the sides and a shoulder strap. Mesh allows the equipment to dry after use/ rinsing. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Artur C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: We use this bag for the toys in the backyard -- 2 basketballs, large water guns, mitts and ball, a rolled up water slide, and a couple of other things that the kids play with while in the backyard. I like the bag because it holds a lot and seems strong. It has a couple of zippered pockets for smaller "loose" items. So far so good! We hung the bag on a hook, so its easy to see what's in the bag. That also makes it easier to unzip and get the items in it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for all my scuba diving gear.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great duffel bag. It fits my full-length thins wetsuit mask snorkel and a couple other little clear bags with personal items. you can actually carry it like a backpack which makes it more comfortable for traveling. It is very sturdy nothing ripped the zippers are high-quality and strong. And the octopus logo is just an added bonus. I definitely recommend this duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: cammya717

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap pops apart with almost zero weight in the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced for the quality. The shoulder strap has never worked, any amount of weight and in pops right off. The zippers stay closed fine, but are very cheep and therefor difficult to close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite line for scuba gear
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2 sets of fins, 2 sets of masks. 1 full wet suit 1 shorty, multiple accessories with plenty of room to spare. I love the kraken aquatics line
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Zamboanga

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag with heavy duty zipper!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is perfect, heavy duty zipper and feels like quality material/components from the start (hooks and such). My previous bag (not by Kraken) was great, but the zipper failed, so I really wanted to get one that addressed that weakness, this one fits that bill!
customer_reviews.author: William Spight

customer_reviews.title: Not for actual scuba diving equipment use
customer_reviews.text: Strap construction is flimsy at best. The shoulder strap stitching and zipper both broke free while using it to carry just my fins/bc/wetsuit/reg.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Paleo

customer_reviews.title: BIG Divers' Mesh Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large enough to accommodate all the gear two divers need except BC's. There's also a decent-sized zipper pocket at one end. The mesh is substantial enough to last for a lot of carries on and off dive-boats. I would probably pay twice as much for a bag of similar size and quality from one of my usual sources.
customer_reviews.author: gametime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag with TONS of space.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice back. I put my and my son's snorkeling gear in here - 2 large full face masks with built in snorkels, 2 sets of fins, 2 towels, 2 flashlights, 2 inflatable lifevests, and a few other odds and ends and less than half of the bag is full. The bag looks awesome - my only complaint is that it is TOO big for my needs. I could use one just over half this size.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag can easily hold a farmer john 7mm suit (2x), BCD, and the rest (minus weights). It's great for going on a boat dive.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke first use
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use the shoulder strap. First time I used it, the shoulder strap broke while walking off the boat - nearly all my gear fell in the harbor. Fortunately it first hit the dive deck and one of the guides grabbed it before it fell in the water. I only had fins, wetsuit, mask, towel, and a water bottle - I didn’t even have a BC or regs in the bag. Used on a couple more dives and handle straps worked okay.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: strong and big
customer_reviews.text: The mesh sides and stitching seem strong. It folds back into itself for compact storage. It holds life vests and snorkel equipment, including flippers, for my family of five. Update: I down-graded from five to four stars because after a week of heavy use at the beach, the zipper broke. But I still like the bag. I just wish the zipper was more heavy-duty.
customer_reviews.author: Incanus

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit "the longest of long fins" like it says on the page
customer_reviews.text: The description said it "fits even the longest on of long fins" but I probably should have taken that with a grain of salt and actually measured it because my long fins definitely did not fit by like 4-5in
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scuba Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: Realky awesome gear bags. Whole thing folds up into itself with built in bag, about the size of a car window shade. Seems sturdy although I have not yet used it on a dive yet but will soon. Glad I got the extra large size to have plenty of room for all my scuba gear. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.  Nice design.  But the big one.
customer_reviews.text: I shoulda bought the larger one. I’m 6’3, 225lb. And it could zip with fins, booties, mask, snorkel, reg, and bcg.... and a 7mm wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Y

customer_reviews.title: Great for dive gear!
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag with all of my dive gear to Grand Cayman and it was perfect. I like the storage inside to keep wallet and papers dry. The best part is that it collapses in to a round case about 1" thick and packs away in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes for this bag, but the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this bag, but the zipper broke on my very first use. Loaded only with a standard scuba set including wetsuit, b/c, fins, etc. The teeth on the zipper appear heavy duty, but as you can see in the picture, the point where the zipper is sown into the seam along with the shoulder harness attachment point gave out. I haven't even made it to my first dive.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Denham

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Duffle Gear Bag with Shoulder Strap for Scuba Diving, Snorkel, Swimming, Beach and Sports Equipment
customer_reviews.text: The bag worked well. All stitching and fabric seems excellent quality. Zipper stayed closed. Shoulder strap is comfortable. I was surprised that the entire large bag flips inside the inner pocket for storage. This compactibility is really a great feature for me, because it takes up much less room when stored away.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ruston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for your gear
customer_reviews.text: The bag consists of breathable mesh, is well constructed and looks sturdy on top of being large enough to carry both of our snorkel gear comfortably. We purchased this bag to transport all of our gear on our upcoming ten-year wedding anniversary trip- so far, I am impressed with the bag in spite of having not used it yet, but will update this review upon my return.
customer_reviews.author: ladygator74

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, works well, large.
customer_reviews.text: Great company with strong customer service (special deal when buying a large quantity for a non-profit). The bags are large and so far have held up well. I like the XL size best.
customer_reviews.author: BayKayaking

customer_reviews.title: I love mine
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and sturdy design with an attractive graphic. I recommend it to you.
customer_reviews.author: sean aust

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my kayak gear
customer_reviews.text: As a professional kayak guide I have a lot of essential gear. This duffel bag fits my PFD, spray skirt, splash jacket, extra fleece, water shoes, booties, and a small dry bag. It cleans up easily and hasn't fallen apart yet lol. Also it's got a super cool Kraken logo, a good talisman against Poseidon's whims.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Waterfitness Support
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for transporting water fitness gear back and forth to the pool. Holds a lot of gear and can handle heavy & wet. Love that it can roll back up into a small hanging disc shaped bag for storage and it has a small loop to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Large bag, durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for our family of four to fit snorkel gear in and survive a flight to Maui. Even a little bigger than needed for us but would also work well with two sets of scuba gear, I imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Goferhkynut

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it’s going to work out fine
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only put my scuba gear into it I haven’t really taken on any outings yet but it looks like it’s going to be durable and just what I need
customer_reviews.author: Greg Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy gear transport. Side pocket should not be made of netting.
customer_reviews.text: Used to transport snorkel gear. Excellent and sturdy zipper. Bag well constructed and tear resistant. I wish side pocket was opaque and did not have netting, so as to keep things in there free of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Wasserman Scola

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: Can fit 6 large towels in this bag. Have used it once successfully for hauling towels on and off a boat. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Fits two sets of adult fins with masks and snorkels ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits two sets of adult fins with masks and snorkels no problem. I wasn't looking for the collapsability but it's a nifty design for when it's not in use. I'll probably add the 5th star after I've had it out on a dive or to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Light but strong
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than the bag it replaced but my husband was very pleased with it on his week long Roatan scuba trip.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy N

customer_reviews.title: Kraken mesh bag
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely built. Took the bigger size to fit all my dive gear. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag came exactly as advertised. Great bag! If I had to nitpick I would say that, while the zippers haven't broken at all or anything yet, for some reason they seem to be a bit flimsy so I'm always thinking about it while using the bag. Other than that the bag is enormous and fits absolutely everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jessep

customer_reviews.title: Big,badass, bag !!
customer_reviews.text: Solid bag for sure. HUGE ! We did some snorkeling in Aruba and I was able to carry snorkel gear with flippers for 4 people plus had extra room for towels. It’s so big I might have to downsize to a size more suitable for just my girlfriend and I so I don’t have to deal with quite so much bulkiness.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Dyer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: We fit two sets of fins, masks, snorkels, towels, dry clothes, AND OUR BCDS with room to spare About the time we had the bag was getting heavy but the bag was still holding This is a Great product Thanks
customer_reviews.author: maria england

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for the boat gear
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this bag. Bought to organize inflatable floats and odd items for my boat. Keeps items tucked away while cruising the lake . Looks good, zipper is sturdy, bag seems to be of high quality . Overall very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: jordansdad

customer_reviews.title: Scuba diving
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for all of my sons equipment for scuba diving he loves it very comfortable and all of his equipment and towels fit in the bag. I would recommend it its really nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your diving buddies
customer_reviews.text: I love my dive bag. I use it for bring all my gear to dive sites. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag for some snorkel gear but pretty small to fit much more than some short fins mask and snorkel
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for freediving fins and gear.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't taken this bag to the beach yet, but it's a great size for freediving fins and wetsuit. Seems to be made pretty well and I like the mesh so stuff dries right in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. I love how large it is. it easily fits my 28" fins, wetsuit, goggles, boots, and snorkel. Seems large enough to fit a BCD too, but not much more than all of that. So if you has a BCD and regulator, you may need a larger bag. Still, exactly what was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Libassi

customer_reviews.title: Fits All my dive gear!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for years and works perfect, allows gear to breathe and drain after a dive. Fits wetsuit, BCD, regulator, fins, boots, mask, and snorkel easily. Extra side pocket for keys, wallet, or defog! Not stretchy but flexible and collapsible.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Fits all my scuba gear without a problem. Easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K

customer_reviews.title: Can almost hold TWO kids
customer_reviews.text: This bag is massive, mate! And it collapses down and zips into a disk not much bigger than a Frisbee. Holds all of my, my wifes, and our kids gear. My four year old and two year old can lay down in it, fully zipped. I wouldn't recommend trying to lift them though. While I am certain that this is a durable product, for the sake of its longevity don't do this TOO often :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT suitable for scuba
customer_reviews.text: First time using this bag I loaded it with (dry) scuba equipment... one set: bcd, reg, fins, mask, wetsuit and accessories. Halfway across the parking lot to the boat and the strap breaks (pic) dropping my gear off my shoulder and into the mud. The stitching on it has the strength and quality of a badly made T-shirt. Do not buy this bag for Scuba, it is not suitable.
customer_reviews.author: James Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large
customer_reviews.text: Nice and large. Seem to be pretty good in quality. I am only concerned about the zipper. It seems I little flimsy for a bag designed for wet scuba equipment. They get 5 stars right now and I will change that if the zipper ever does fail.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bag! Big and fits a lot of gear. Arrived quickly. Very satisfied and will likely buy another soon. We now have 3 bags!
customer_reviews.author: Kayak King

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It holds all of my essential dive gear with room to spare. It folds up and zips into it's own built-in zipper pocket for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. McKee

customer_reviews.title: zipper is garbage - cheaply made - zipper broke on our first ...
customer_reviews.text: zipper is garbage - zipper broke on our first trip - had to buy another bag while on vacation to get our gear home - wasn't happy - you'll want to look elsewhere for something to carry your things
customer_reviews.author: BRD

customer_reviews.title: Look Cool Walking to the Beach with this Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag in size Large, worried that it would still be too big for my mask, fin and snorkel. They fit perfect! With extra room to spare for towels and clothes. Even has a nice handy side pocket. This bag is very compact and stores easily if not in use. Love the logo on the side looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: THIS BAG IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is a ventilated, super strong, well designed bag that is HUGE and holds tons of beach gear... and I love your Kraken logo too. (You should give your graphic designer a big kraken kiss for this one!)
customer_reviews.author: CWatson

customer_reviews.title: Zipper gave out after a few months...
customer_reviews.text: I was initially super happy with this bag until two things happened...the zipper attachment broke off so it can't be zipped anymore and it tore. It held up pretty well, but after a few months (and no, I wasn't carting dive weights around) it gave way.
customer_reviews.author: Hootiemcfly

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is mesh
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very large! I can fit mine and my son's gear in here with plenty of room to spare. I love that it is mesh, so everything dries quickly. It also can fold up into itself! It has hand straps that are sewn into the bag and a shoulder strap that latches on so you can wear it.
customer_reviews.author: CNC

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Mesh is thin, and zippers don’t seem very strong. Overall decent, but for a little more money you can get a much better bag.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Works...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 2 sets of snorkels, fins, towels and sunscreen. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna S

customer_reviews.title: Nice mesh bag with large
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Nice mesh bag with large, comfortable zips.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Great dive bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Excellent quality mesh duffle with cool graphics. Nicely designed, I'm sure it will last 10 years of hard dive gear duty- just like my last one. Bonus feature, this bag collapses and zips into its own convenient storage pouch. Take it on the boat, empty your gear, zip it away neatly until you need to pack up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It came in pretty friggin fast like holly hell. All my gear will fit in here and it makes a perfect mesh bag for the price. Or even a spare when I need a fully inclosed bag
customer_reviews.author: trevon

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easily fits BCD, Fins, Reg and misc gear. When its folded up, I fit my video lighting in the bag for extra padding during travel. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tons of gear
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to hold fins, masks, and snorkels for my sons and I. Worked perfectly. Got 3 sets into the bag with room to spare. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Goterps007

customer_reviews.title: Good sized bag for the $
customer_reviews.text: Really haven't put it to the test as I just recieved it today. I dis load it up with 4 sets of fine, booties, mask, gloves, and other items. Very spacious. Nice mesh bash from what I can see so far.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Fits all our snorkel gear plus towels and spare clothes. With the mesh body it dries quickly and doesn't get that musty wet smell I've experience with some other fully enclosed bags.
customer_reviews.author: JennyTX87

customer_reviews.title: I love this large
customer_reviews.text: I love this large, mesh duffle bag! It's capable of carrying all of your dive or beach gear, and conveniently folds into itself to be compact enough to pack and take anywhere. The Kraken Aquatics logo is vibrant and very cool.
customer_reviews.author: hilobeanz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Love how the bag ships in its own pocket, which turns into an interior pocket when using the bag. Smart design! Only used it once, but my initial impression is that this is a high quality bag. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE AND HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big, and very durable. I had no problem with the hard plastic zippers and it folds up for storage. This bag I'm using for SCUBA and snorkel gear. It fits everything with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy. Fit my size 15 flippers with room ...
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy. Fit my size 15 flippers with room to spare. Well designed. We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Excelsior

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Dive Bag, medium
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Very light and very breatheable nylon mesh dive bag, medium size with full length zipper and carry strap, one end having a separately zipped pouch mesh, the other a closed canvas zip pouch.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Parker

customer_reviews.title: I love this gear bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this gear bag. It holds both my husband's and my scuba gear with some room to spare. And it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It has a high quality look and feel. It has plenty of room for lots of gear. I will update this review after use if it doesn't hold up, but I don't expect any issues.
customer_reviews.author: aerazona

customer_reviews.title: AWWSOME gear bag
customer_reviews.text: Just love my gear bag. It nice and big very roomy. And even washes up real nice. I did not put it in the dryer just let it air dry. It dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Beth-Anne McDine

product_meta.title: Kraken Aquatics Mesh Duffle Gear Bag with Shoulder Strap | for Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, Swimming, Beach and Sports Equipment
feature_bullets: Easily carry all your gear in one bag: Our spacious mesh bag is great for most sports equipment including snorkel, dive, swim gear, beach toys and many more.

Quickly rinse off your gear: The mesh material allows you to quickly and easily rinse any salt water, sand, dirt or mud off through your bag while your gear is still inside. The mesh allows any water to drain and helps your gear to quickly air dry to prevent mildew.

Store all your small items in the zippered side mesh pocket: Easily store small items that you would like to keep separate from the main bag such as cameras, sunscreen, glasses, gloves, etc. The bag also comes with a convenient storage pocket built right in on the inside of the bag for travel or long-term storage.

Adjustable shoulder strap for easy carrying: The included shoulder strap allows for easier carrying especially when loaded with a lot of gear (up to 35 lbs) or for those who don’t want to use the hand straps.
Large Bag Dimensions: 30” long, 13” wide and 13” tall
